Title: Relates to the reporting of electronic waste collection and recycling data, the sale of electronic waste and the carry-forward of sales of electronic waste
Summary: Relates to the reporting of electronic waste collection and recycling data, the sale of electronic waste and the carry-forward of sales of electronic waste.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the reporting of electronic waste collection and recycling data, the sale of electronic waste and the carry-forward of sales of electronic waste
